com.soa.delegate
Class HandlerProviderBroker

java.lang.Object
  com.soa.delegate.HandlerProviderBroker

public class HandlerProviderBroker
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton shared accross application/classloader boundaries for registering a HandlerProvider and obtaining the registered HandlerProvider. The delegate application will register the provider. The client application will retrieve it.

Method Summary
static HandlerProviderBroker getInstance()
          Returns the broker singleton instance.
 HandlerProvider getProvider()
          Returns the handler provider published by the delegate to the client.
 void setProvider(HandlerProvider provider)
          Called by the delegate to publish the handler provider.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

setProvider

public void setProvider(HandlerProvider provider)
Called by the delegate to publish the handler provider.
